metadata.title: CVE-2020-25666 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: There are 4 places in HistogramCompare() in MagickCore/histogram.c where aninteger overflow is possible during simple math calculations. This occursin the rgb values and `count` value for a color. The patch uses casts to`ssize_t` type for these calculations, instead of `int`. This flaw couldimpact application reliability in the event that ImageMagick processes acrafted input file. This flaw affects ImageMagick versions prior to7.0.9-0.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
